name: Skin Serum
description: Our Anti-Ageing Skin Serum is packed with powerful antioxidants, hyaluronic acid, and botanical extracts that reduce fine lines, boost elasticity, and restore youthful radiance. Lightweight, fast-absorbing, and perfect for daily use—because glowing, firm skin starts now.
